content:
During porting ContinuousLinearMap.prodMapL lost a simp call because the rewriting needed to be done at default transparency, hence a big rw call.

In place of that, the porter cleverly wrote repeat first | rw [X] | rw [Y] |...

Unfortunately, this results in the declaration timing out.

#9658 replaces this (and the remainder of the proof) with a simp [(X),(Y),...] call and adds a note about the underlying problem. We can remove the heartbeat bump as a consequence and move closer to mathport suggestion
I hadn't realized the simp [(X)] hammer still had nails to hit
After #9757, this will once again be the largest file measured by instructions. I believe Iâ€™ve answered the questions in the PR.
